Property.name: Offset X
Property.description: Outline X-offset relative to the text

Property.name: Offset Y
Property.description: Outline Y-offset relative to the text

Property.name: ControlID
Property.description: The unique ID of this object

Property.name: CommandID
Property.description: The message ID sent by this window

Property.name: Area
Property.description: The rectangular extent of the window

Property.name: Caption
Property.description: The text contents or title of the window

Property.name: Visible
Property.description: Flag indicating that this window is visible

Property.name: TextFont
Property.description: Default Text Style for this window

Property.name: Enabled
Property.description: Flag to put the window into an interactive state

Property.name: IgnoreMouse
Property.description: Flag indicating that this window can recieve mouse events

Property.name: ClickToFront
Property.description: If true, window will move to front when clicked

Property.name: AlwaysInFront
Property.description: If true, window will always be in front of windows that don't have this flag

Property.name: Clip
Property.description: Flag indicating whether child windows should be clipped

Property.name: Alignment
Property.description: Specifes the horizontal alignment of the button within the window area whenever a fixed width flag is set. This is only the horizontal alignment, the button is always centered vertically. The caption text area always complements the alignment of the button.

Property.name: CaptionOffset
Property.description: Specifies the caption offset to be used when the button is selected/depressed

Property.name: CaptionColors
Property.description: Specifies the caption colors for each possible button state

Property.name: ButtonGroupID
Property.description: Allows to group buttons together. Combined with radio button type this enables radio button group control.

Property.name: TriggerOnDown
Property.description: Button considers itself clicked on mouse/key down rather than mouse/key up

Property.name: FixedWidth
Property.description: Button is fixed width - this means that you can still resize the window area but the actual button width will remain fixed and and it will be positioned within a given window area. Most often used with radio and check box buttons with caption text positioned to the left or right of the button.

Property.name: FixedHeight
Property.description: Button is fixed height - this means that you can still resize the window area but the actual button height will remain fixed and and it will be positioned within a given window area. Most often used with radio and check box buttons with caption text positioned to the left or right of the button.

Property.name: Alignment
Property.description: Specifes the horizontal alignment of the button within the window area whenever a fixed width flag is set. This is only the horizontal alignment, the button is always centered vertically. The caption text area always complements the alignment of the button.

Property.name: CaptionOffset
Property.description: Specifies the caption offset to be used when the button is selected/depressed

Property.name: CaptionColors
Property.description: Specifies the caption colors for each possible button state

Property.name: ButtonGroupID
Property.description: Allows to group buttons together. Combined with radio button type this enables radio button group control.

Property.name: TriggerOnDown
Property.description: Button considers itself clicked on mouse/key down rather than mouse/key up

Property.name: FixedWidth
Property.description: Button is fixed width - this means that you can still resize the window area but the actual button width will remain fixed and and it will be positioned within a given window area. Most often used with radio and check box buttons with caption text positioned to the left or right of the button.

Property.name: FixedHeight
Property.description: Button is fixed height - this means that you can still resize the window area but the actual button height will remain fixed and and it will be positioned within a given window area. Most often used with radio and check box buttons with caption text positioned to the left or right of the button.

Property.name: Alignment
Property.description: Specifes the horizontal alignment of the pull-down button within the window area.

Property.name: Colors
Property.description: Specifies the text foreground and background colors.

Property.name: ComboBoxDrawable
Property.description: Object to render combo box appearance

Property.name: ScrollbarDrawable
Property.description: Custom scrollbar drawable for pull down menu

Property.name: VisibleValuesCount
Property.description: Specifies how many values should be shown at once in the pull-down list

Property.name: Outline
Property.description: An outline is drawn around the control when highlighted

Property.name: ValueList
Property.description: List of available values for the combo box.

Property.name: VisibleRange
Property.description: The amount of the range that is visible

Property.name: PageOverlap
Property.description: The amount of overlap when paging up / down

Property.name: ArrowDelta
Property.description: The amount of units to move when clicking on the arrows

Property.name: MinThumbSize
Property.description: The minimum thumb size, in pixels

Property.name: ValueDelta
Property.description: Number by wich the spinner value is incremented or decremented.

Property.name: ValuePeriod
Property.description: The frequency at which the value is changed. In miliseconds.

Property.name: Read Only
Property.description: If set to true, the text cannot be changed

Property.name: Accepts Return
Property.description: If set to true, allows return to insert a new line

Property.name: Accepts Insert Key
Property.description: If set to true, allow using the insert key to toggle insert vs. overwrite mode

Property.name: Overwrite
Property.description: If set to true, causes newly entered characters to overwrite existing characters

Property.name: Hide Inactive Selection
Property.description: If set to true, the selection will be hidden if we don't have focus

Property.name: Hide Caret
Property.description: If set to true, the flashing caret is hidden

Property.name: Enable Clipboard
Property.description: If set to true, allows copy and paste to and from clipboard

Property.name: Password Mode
Property.description: If set to true, the displayed text is obscured, and won't copy to clipboard

Property.name: Wrap Mode
Property.description: SingleLine - all text in one line, MultiLine - wrap on hard linebreaks only, MultiLineWordWrap - Multiline with soft wordwrap

Property.name: Undo History Size
Property.description: Max number of undo operations to remember

Property.name: CloseButtonDrawable
Property.description: Object to render dialog close button appearance

Property.name: MinWidth
Property.description: Specifies the minimum width of the dialog

Property.name: MinHeight
Property.description: Specifies the minimum height of the dialog

Property.name: MaxWidth
Property.description: Specifies the maximum width of the dialog

Property.name: MaxHeight
Property.description: Specifies the maximum height of the dialog

Property.name: Type
Property.description: Pre-defined type of the message box

Property.name: Gutter
Property.description: A common gutter between all components of the message box

Property.name: ColumnHeadingsList
Property.description: List of column headings for grid

Property.name: RowHeadingsList
Property.description: List of row headings for grid

Property.name: Editable
Property.description: If turned off, normally editable grid elements are disabled

Property.name: HScrollbar
Property.description: Allows the display of a horizontal scroll bar if needed

Property.name: VScrollbar
Property.description: Allows the display of a vertical scroll bar if needed

Property.name: ColumnHeadings
Property.description: Enables column headings. This refers to a row along the top that has titles and stays on top when vertically scrolling

Property.name: RowHeadings
Property.description: Enables row headings. This refers to a column along the left that has titles and stays there when horizontally scrolling

Property.name: ColumnGrid
Property.description: Enables vertical gridlines that separate each column

Property.name: RowGrid
Property.description: Enables horizontal gridlines that separate each row

Property.name: InsertionMode
Property.description: Puts the grid into insertion mode. So if there is an operation that inserts cells, this flag makes it insert instead of overwrite

Property.name: DrawGridOutline
Property.description: Outline around grid area of window, which is inset from the window if gutter sizes are nonzero

Property.name: CellWrapping
Property.description: Wrap whatever is in the cell to fit. Usually applies to text. If cell column is set to a fixed size, this can cause a cell row to grow in height when text wraps

Property.name: AllowNoSelection
Property.description: If true, then you don't have to have any single cell, column, or row selected

Property.name: FixedColumnCount
Property.description: If true, then we act like a fixed size grid, and scrollbars scroll to the edge. If false, then we act like a freeform spreadsheet when you can keep scrolling to the right forever

Property.name: DrawPastLastColumn
Property.description: Spreadsheets want this turned on. Listboxes want this flag turned off. Basically, with a listbox you want to stop scrolling and drawing at the end of the listbox data

Property.name: CellsOverlapped
Property.description: Allows for overlapped cells - text from one cell can overlapp with adjacent cells

Property.name: HighlightCellDataOnly
Property.description: Sets highlighting to only the cell data and not the cell background

Property.name: DefaultRowColHeaderText
Property.description: When on, and headers are enabled, generates headers automatically; when off, header text is blank unless user calls SetRowHeading()/SetColumnHeading() manually

Property.name: IndentWidth
Property.description: Number of pixels to indent per nesting level

Property.name: LineWidth
Property.description: Width of connecting lines between nodes

Property.name: DrawLines
Property.description: Enables the rendering of connecting lines

Property.name: DrawRootLines
Property.description: Enabled connecting lines at the root level

Property.name: HideSelection
Property.description: Hide the selection when the window does not have focus

Property.name: FullRowSelect
Property.description: Allows nodes to be selected by clicking anywhere along the row

Property.name: MultiSelect
Property.description: Enables multiple items to be selected by holding SHIFT or CTRL while clicking

Property.name: Proportions
Property.description: The relative origin of each edge, as a fraction of parent

Property.name: Trigger
Property.description: The type of event that triggers this effect

Property.name: InterpolationType
Property.description: The interpolation type for the effect envelope

Class.name: Glide
Class.description: Causes windows to glide on/off the screen when triggered

Property.name: Offset
Property.description: The direction and distance to displace the window when hidden

Class.name: Fade
Class.description: Causes windows to fade out when triggered

Class.name: Inflate
Class.description: Causes windows to grow / shrink when triggered

Property.name: Scale
Property.description: The scale factor of the window when triggered

Property.name: Delay
Property.description: Initial delay of the cascade, in seconds

Class.name: Rotate
Class.description: Causes windows to rotate when triggered

Property.name: RotX
Property.description: X component of rotation axis (need not be normalized)

Property.name: RotY
Property.description: Y component of rotation axis (need not be normalized)

Property.name: RotZ
Property.description: Z component of rotation axis (need not be normalized)

Property.name: RotAngle
Property.description: Angle to rotate by clockwise (in degrees)

Class.name: Perspective
Class.description: Causes windows to deform via a perspective-projection

Property.name: NearPlane
Property.description: Near plane z-position (strength of perspective effect)

Property.name: Trigger
Property.description: The event that triggers the navigation

Property.name: NavigateFrom
Property.description: Allows the navigator to be selectively enabled based on the current focus window

Class.name: Relative
Class.description: Changes the focus window when a specific button or key is pressed.

Property.name: Target
Property.description: The window, relative to the current focus window, that should recieve focus.

Class.name: ExplicitID
Class.description: Changes the focus window when a specific button or key is pressed.

Property.name: Target
Property.description: The window to recieve focus when this navigator is activated.

Class.name: StdDrawable
Class.description: A drawable uses multiple images to render multiple control states

Property.name: ScaleType
Property.description: Specifies how the image should be stretched when the window changes size.

Property.name: ScaleFactor
Property.description: Scaling factor for the non-stretched portions of the artwork.

Property.name: ScaleArea
Property.description: Indicates the width of each non-stretched edge, as a proportion of image size (0 to 1).

Class.name: FrameDrawable
Class.description: A procedural drawable that renders multiple frame styles

Property.name: BorderWidth
Property.description: Width of border for each edge

Property.name: Image
Property.description: Standard 4 state image - Disabled | Normal | Highlighted | Depressed

Property.name: Tileable
Property.description: Specifies whether the image should be edge tiled.

Property.name: Image
Property.description: Radio or checkbox 6 state image - Normal | Highlighted | Depressed | Selected | Selected Highlighted | Selected Depressed

Property.name: Tileable
Property.description: Specifies whether the image should be edge tiled.

Property.name: Images
Property.description: List of images used by this drawable

Property.name: Images
Property.description: List of images used by this drawable

Property.name: Images
Property.description: List of images used by this drawable

Property.name: Images
Property.description: List of images used by this drawable

Class.name: DialogDrawable
Class.description: Standard drawable for a dialog title bar

Property.name: BackImageBlitMode
Property.description: Stretch - stretches background image, Tile - tiles image, StretchCenter - Stretches center of image and tiles edges, TileCenter - Tiles center and edges

Property.name: Images
Property.description: List of images used by this drawable

Property.name: FixedWidth
Property.description: Preserves the original width of the image

Property.name: FixedHeight
Property.description: Preserves the original height of the image
